website_summaries.verdict: The Favi J6-LED-Pico Projector With AirPlay and Miracast lets you project content wirelessly from compatible Android and iOS mobile devices.
pros: Can wirelessly project from Android and iOS devices
Good set of connection choices, including HDMI with Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL)
cons: Wireless projection from iOS devices is onerous and occasionally glitchy
Not all Android devices support Miracast

customer_reviews.title: Looks 10, Dance 3.
customer_reviews.text: Looks 10, dance 3. It's a remarkable little device, brighter than I imagined for the price and size. But you are 100% on your own trying to figure out how to use it. The instructions are a joke. I can use it with HDMI cable on my mac air, but no matter how often I try, I cannot get it to connect to my WIFI. I've written to them and heard nothing back. But I'm going to keep trying, because as I said....it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Glazen

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work as described
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning it! I like the idea of this device, but its performance is not very good. Plugged in, it displays well, but using Airplay, either from my Mac, iphone or iPad, it is not good. It takes a lot of time to load up a video. For example, a 10 second video in my photo album took about 20 seconds to load up and start playing. The quality was very bad too... lots of artifacts and distortions on the screen. In my opinion the airplay/wifi feature is useless, which is why I bought this device. I'd rather have a cheaper, plug-in only device.

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy! Picture is very clear and large for the unit's tiny size. I have used it to project content wirelessly from my Android tablet and phones onto a 5 foot screen outdoors. As I said, the picture is great, but there cannot be very much ambient light at all. Took off one star because the included tri-pod is not as stable as I had hoped, and the instructions weren't the easiest to follow. Once you figure out how to connect your tablet or phone via Miracast though, it works great. Can't wait for more poolside movie nights next summer!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product that still impresses people when they first see ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product that still impresses people when they first see it. Portable and lightweight. Very versatile with many options from micro sd to hdmi and even wireless casting from any Apple or Android device! Very well built and a quality device for the premium price. I just wish it had a remote or at least an IR receiver so I can use my universal remotes. Also the audio quality is horrible but you can easily hook the audio up to separate speakers.

customer_reviews.title: i can live with it
customer_reviews.text: I'll likely get something more luxurious in the future. Even though it doesn't hold a charge, I decided I could live with that, since it's going to be connected to something whenever I use it anyway. Just be aware of the risk that you'll be deciding to either return it or not rely on the battery. Apart from that, it's a great little gizmo with quirky directions, and it fills my few demands.

product_meta.title: FAVI J6 LED DLP (FWVGA) Pico+ Pocket Projector - US Version (Includes Warranty) - Pro AV Series (J6-LED-PICO)
product_meta.description:
J6 pocket projector by FAVI is designed with a 2-in-1 built-in battery (5,000 mAh) allowing you to use as an emergency phone/tablet charger when you're not projecting. This Pocket projector also includes a built-in speaker, headphone jack and an on-board Media Player for music, photo and Video file playback from any Micro SD card or USB Device. 

Language Supported (on screen display menu): 
English, Polish (Polski), Dutch (Nederlands), Portuguese (Português), Slovenian (Slovenina), Norwegian (norsk), Serbian (srpski), Turkish (Esky), French (Franais), Korean, Spanish / Español (espaol), German (deutsch), Italian (Italiano), Romanian (Pomnete), Hungarian (Magyar), Russian (Pу́сский), Croatian (Rvatski), Slovokian (Slovak), Swedish (Svenska), Finnish (Suomi), Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Croatian (hrvatski)

Note only products shipped from and sold by authorized resellers such as Amazon.com can ensure that you will be receiving products that have a valid warranty.

IOS compatibility = 8.4 and lower.Windows compatibility = 10 and lower. May require video graphics drivers to be updated on computer to work properly.
